code: export var ADD_MOVIE_FAVORITE="ADD_MOVIE_FAVORITE";export var GET_MOVIES="GET_MOVIES";export var REMOVE_MOVIE_FAVORITE="REMOVE_MOVIE_FAVORITE";export var GET_MOVIE_DETAIL="GET_MOVIE_DETAIL";export function addMovieFavorite(payload){return{type:ADD_MOVIE_FAVORITE,payload:payload};}export function getMovies(titulo){return function(dispatch){var apykey="Ingresa aqui el apikey de OMDB.";return fetch("http://www.omdbapi.com/?apikey=".concat(apykey,"&s=").concat(titulo)).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(json){dispatch({type:GET_MOVIES,payload:json});});};}export function removeMovieFavorite(payload){return{type:REMOVE_MOVIE_FAVORITE,payload:payload};}export function getMovieDetail(id){return function(dispatch){var apykey="Ingresa aqui el apikey de OMDB.";return fetch("http://www.omdbapi.com/?apikey=".concat(apykey,"&i=").concat(id)).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(json){dispatch({type:GET_MOVIE_DETAIL,payload:json});});};}
